metadata.title: CVE-2020-19131 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow in LibTiff v4.0.10 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via the "invertImage()" function in the component "tiffcrop".

notes.note: mdeslaur> reproducer causes an out-of-bounds read, so DoS only

criterions.comment: tiff package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.0-1build1').
